name: Thief Bird
description:
• You’ll have to fly into the funny places around the world, explore the cities and stealing something expensive!

  • Steal all stuff and you’ll be able to upgrade your birds improving such features as: their performance, life, and appearance.

  • More than 60+ achievements for stolen things!

  • Compete with other players to become the best thief of Thief Bird. Take the first place in the global ranking of best thiefs!
